resources.string: A little robot made with Node.js which search the web and find comments made in websites Tripadvisor, FourSquare and generating gourmet descriptions for your next fancy meal. That\'s a funny joke with words that say nothing like George Orwell exposes in his article Politic and English Language
Made open and without drama by:

- Guilherme G. Santos (@gui_gsantos)
- Guilherme KÃ¼rten (@darthkurten)
- Murilo Mafra (@MuriloM)
- Thiago Grossmann (@garlig)
- Zeh Fernandes (@zehf)
Thanks to Alexandre Pamplona for helping with english version
